name: @elliottcable/bs-sedlex
description: An OCaml lexer generator for Unicode

scripts.clean: npm run clean:runtime && npm run clean:ppx
scripts.build: npm run build:runtime && npm run build:ppx
scripts.prepare:ppx: npm run clean:ppx && npm run build:ppx && node package/package.js
scripts.prepare: npm run clean:runtime && npm run build:runtime

author: Alain Frisch <alain.frisch@lexifi.com>
